data.actual_result: Invite blocks keep resolving and 5 out of 15 is not even displayed after it's resolved.
data.expected_result: It was displaying all the 15 invites a few weeks ago, without long resolving times.
data.short_description: 10+ invites on text channel causes bug
data.steps_to_repro: - The channel have 15 servers posted on it. - 10 of the invites Will stay grey and keep resolving until 10-20 minutes. - After it is resolved only the first 10 is displayed, the remaining 5 is not visible. - Only the desktop version is affected, it Works fine on both Android and IOS devices. - Around 100 user reported that they have this issue to me. - Installed discord on a fresh WIN10 pc, the issue is still there.
